title: Helping Farm Operators Build Labor Management Know-How

tasks.task: Farm Labor Dashboard Introduction and Tour
subtasks: Responding to the need for farm labor management
Presenting the farm labor dashboard tools
Generating a job description for farm positions
Creating a policy manual for farm operations
Utilizing the resource library and filters
Answering questions on farm labor management tools
Sharing experiences and challenges in farm labor management
Discussing future plans for the farm labor dashboard
Introducing DISC workplace assessment for farm managers
Promoting the development of an employee satisfaction questionnaire

tasks.task: Building a learning network for farm labor management
subtasks: Collecting contact information for future updates and resource sharing
Encouraging collaboration among farmers, extension agents, and technical assistance providers
Discussing the potential for a community of practice on farm labor issues
